subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Devin Harris scored 13 of his 24 points in the fourth quarter to lead the Dallas Mavericks to a 100-91 victory against the Indiana Pacers last night and extend the N.B.A.’s longest winning streak to 12 games.
snippet: Devin Harris scored 13 of his 24 points in the fourth quarter to lead the Dallas Mavericks to a 100-91 victory against the Indiana Pacers last night and extend the N.B.A.’s longest winning streak to 12 games.
